title: Final Day of SEC and ACC Media Days
description:
Wendi Nix, Eric Mac Lain, Eddie Royal and Benjamin Watson discuss expectations for Mario Cristobal in Year 1 at Miami. Jimbo Fisher, Bryan Harsin and Josh Heupel also take the podium in Charlotte and the crew debates whether the ACC's top returning playmakers will improve on their performances from last year.

itunes:subtitle: CFB Live: The crew breaks down the action from Thursday's ACC and SEC Media Days
